text: Education and Youth Affairs Bureau (; ) is the education agency of Macau. Its head office is in Sé (Cathedral Parish)."Contact Us" (Archive). Education and Youth Affairs Bureau. Retrieved on April 13, 2017. "Address: Avenida de D. João IV, n.os 7-9, 1.° andar, Macau" - "Address in Portuguese" (Archive): "Endereço: Avenida de D.
